turtl3.graphic

Class DispController

  • java.lang.Object
    • turtl3.graphic.DispController

  • public class DispController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the visual representation of the data elements and the menu elements. This includes adding and removing graphic elements and redrawing the display. The class further can change between different views of the programmed elements
    Author:
    PKissmer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DispController(DataController prog)
      Generates a new DispController and sets the committed DataController

      Refreshes the display and writes every item saved in the element lists to the display
